background: A mail delivery service must deliver mail using regular and speed boats, each having different capacities and fuel usage, with a constraint on the number of regular boat trips and a minimum proportion of trips that must be speed boats.

parameters.definition: Maximum number of mail pieces a regular boat can carry per trip
Fuel usage of a regular boat per trip
Maximum number of mail pieces a speed boat can carry per trip
Fuel usage of a speed boat per trip
Maximum number of regular boat trips allowed
Minimum percentage of trips that must be made by speed boats
Total number of pieces of mail to be delivered

constraints.description: Number of regular boat trips is non-negative and does not exceed the maximum number of regular boat trips allowed
constraints.code:
# Constraint: Number of regular boat trips is non-negative and does not exceed the maximum allowed
model.addConstr(0 <= RegularTrips, "RegularTrips_non_negative")
model.addConstr(RegularTrips <= MaxRegularTrips, "RegularTrips_max_limit")

constraints.description: The number of trips made by speed boats must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Since SpeedTrips is already an integer variable, no code is needed to enforce non-negativity
# The Gurobi optimizer enforces the non-negative constraint by default for integer variables.

constraints.description: The number of trips made by regular boats should not exceed the maximum allowed
constraints.code:
# Constraint: The number of trips made by regular boats should not exceed the maximum allowed
model.addConstr(RegularTrips <= MaxRegularTrips, name="max_regular_trips_constraint")

constraints.description: At least MinSpeedPercentage of the total number of trips are made by speed boats
constraints.code:
# Constraint to ensure at least MinSpeedPercentage of the total trips are made by speed boats
model.addConstr(SpeedTrips >= MinSpeedPercentage * TotalTrips, name="min_speed_boat_trips")

constraints.description: The total number of mail pieces delivered by regular and speed boats must meet or exceed the total mail to be delivered
constraints.code:
# Define the constraint for total mail delivery by regular and speed boats
model.addConstr(RegularTrips * RegularCapacity + SpeedTrips * SpeedCapacity >= TotalMail, name="total_mail_delivery")

constraints.description: TotalTrips is the sum of SpeedTrips and RegularTrips
constraints.code:
# Define the constraint where TotalTrips is the sum of SpeedTrips and RegularTrips
model.addConstr(TotalTrips == SpeedTrips + RegularTrips, name="TotalTrips_constraint")

constraints.description: Ensure the number of regular boat trips does not exceed the maximum allowed
Ensure the minimum proportion of trips made by speed boats
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to ensure the minimum proportion of trips made by speed boats
model.addConstr(SpeedTrips >= MinSpeedPercentage * TotalTrips, name="min_speed_boat_trips")

constraints.description: Total trips should be the sum of regular and speed boat trips
constraints.code:
# Constraint: Total trips should be the sum of regular and speed boat trips
model.addConstr(TotalTrips == RegularTrips + SpeedTrips, name="total_trips")

# Ensure all mail is delivered constraint
model.addConstr(RegularTrips * RegularCapacity + SpeedTrips * SpeedCapacity >= TotalMail, "mail_delivery")

variables.definition: The number of trips made by regular boats
The number of trips made by speed boats
The total number of trips made by speed and regular boats

objective.description: Minimize the total amount of gas consumed for delivering all the mail
objective.code:
# Define the objective function
model.setObjective(RegularFuel * RegularTrips + SpeedFuel * SpeedTrips, gp.GRB.MINIMIZE)
